summary: Amendment No. 2 to the Credit Agreement, dated November 12, 2025, involves BLKM III, LLC, the Lenders, Customers Bank, BlackRock Monticello Debt Real Estate Investment Trust, and MonticelloAM Servicing, LLC. It modifies specific provisions of the original Credit Agreement dated July 30, 2025, and requires satisfaction of conditions such as executed agreements, fees, and legal opinions for effectiveness. The amendment also reaffirms representations, warranties, and the binding nature of the original agreement, with specific changes taking precedence.

content.text: Does the 2022 XYZ Corp private placement comply with Regulation D safe harbor requirements?
